org.wonderly.util
Class CodebaseChecker

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.util.CodebaseChecker

public class CodebaseChecker
extends Object

This class provides a simple way validate that an indicated class can be resolved using the passed codebase. This is a simple way to evaluate the completeness of a Jar file for getting a Class object to be constructed. This class should be used to get the Class object, and then further probing can occur on that Class object by using the associated ClassLoader object as the contextClassLoader.

Author:
Gregg Wonderly
